local AccountLoginFrame = {}

function AccountLoginFrame.OnOpenFrame()
    --self.frame:GetObject("btnRegister").onClick:AddListener(AccountRegisterFrame.onClickRegister)
    self.frame:GetObject("btnLogin").onClick:AddListener(AccountLoginFrame.onClickLogin)
    self.frame:GetObject("btnPasswordRetire").onClick:AddListener(AccountLoginFrame.onClickPasswordRetire)
    self.frame:GetObject("btnClose").onClick:AddListener(AccountLoginFrame.onclickClose)

end

AccountLoginFrame.onClickLogin = function()
    --TODO 注册逻辑实现
end

AccountLoginFrame.onClickPasswordRetire = function()
    app.FrameManager.OpenFrameLua(app._FrameList.PasswordRetrieveFrame)
end

AccountLoginFrame.onclickClose = function()
    app.FrameManager.CloseFrame(self.frame)
end

function AccountLoginFrame.OnCloseFrame()

end

-- ----------------------------------------控制代码--------------------------------------------------

return AccountLoginFrame
